front.title: Abstract next-hop addresses in IP VPNs

abstract.t: draft-malyushkin-bess-ip-vpn-abstract-next-hops-00 Abstract This document discusses the IP VPN convergence aspects and specifies procedures for IP VPN to signal the attachment circuit failure. The specified procedures help significantly improve the IP VPN convergence. About This Document This note is to be removed before publishing as an RFC. Status information for this document may be found at https://datatracker.ietf.org/doc/draft-malyushkin-bess-ip-vpn- abstract-next-hops/. Discussion of this document takes place on the BGP Enabled ServiceS Working Group mailing list (mailto:bess@ietf.org), which is archived at https://mailarchive.ietf.org/arch/browse/bess/. Subscribe at https://www.ietf.org/mailman/listinfo/bess/.
